choices: He woke up somewhere , being way weaker than usual
1.content:
** Choices 3 and 5 implies to skip this intro, else enjoy...**



It's summer.
Jake had many fun moments since the beginning of these vacations, now it's 11 AM and he was still lying in his bed wondering what to do today ..

He was really puzzled , Jake had the weirdest dream ever , he dreamt he was 5 inches tall , and had to live a decent life in those condition , first he awoken on his sister's desk she was threatening him she will crush him if he doesn't stand on his knees , beg and tell her he's the family slave , then came his mom who took him and shoved him to her ass and kept him there for a good hour crushing him with her cheeks the whole time . When he was out he was at his aunt's and cousins' feet, he had to rub Cassandra's long smelly feet , lick Laura's pretty but sweaty feet for another hour and kiss Bianca's feet while being captive in in her soc. In the end , The young man was lying on Chloe's hand kissing and telling her how an amazing goddess she is and how he would enjoy spending the rest of his life with her . The last thing he saw before awakening was Samantha raising her shoe , surrounding his frail form with her shadow before the execution happened !.....

"Wow! .. What the hack was that ?" The teen felt uneasy about the recall of his dreams.. He stayed meditating about it while lying in bed for at least half an hour. He finally decided to....

go to his cousin's as her house was not very far away from his ,once there he would be able to play with his cousins at the Switch Bianca had for her birthday .

Or maybe he could see some neighbours as he was a pretty nice and enjoyable person and knew many of them from school. Jake always wanted to get closer to some of them.

He could also go somewhere else, like in attraction parks, library, the mall, to a concert, the cinema with a girl , or even at some friends'.

Or he could also stay at home and play to his video games or doing whatever he can..
1.title: A new morning

choices: Go downstairs to eat something (Slow shrinking)
11.content:
You were still lying in your bed , you stayed like that for about half an hour then finally decided to move ,
You lived in a two floor house .
Your mother told you Sophia and Eva will come soon . The only personl left was Erin ,the maid, there always was something to do or fix in this big house and you sometimes had pity for this young woman to do it all by herself.
Your mother and sister were downstairs you could tell ...
You decided to..
11.title: At home

choices: Call your doctor ( he shrinks everyday )
Go on the Internet (he shrinks when stressed or humiliated )
Call Natalie (his best friend) for advices her mother is a scientist
111.content:
Still dizzy from the sleep and the weird dream you looked at the clock 10 AM , it was high time to grab something for breakfirst .
The first thing that got your attention was your clothes, slightly bigger than you remember ... But who cares? You just wanted to eat so bad you didn't give it another thought.

Once downstairs Sophia was here, also eating, she came back a few days ago and you were happy to see her.
"Hey Jake "
"Hi" you mumbled while heading to the fridge. You took milk, and orange juice then closed it before going for a bowl. You opened the closet and tried to reach it but was surprised to see it was too high.

"Shit" you thought , even on tip toes you were barely touching the side of the bowl. You often had told Erin, the cleaning lady not to put them here because it was hard for you to reach it , she must have forget and put it a bit further than usual.

Seeing your trouble your big sister came to your rescue she tiptoed behind you and you felt her huge body , including her huge boobs pushing on your back making you bent .

"here you are " she gently said
"th..thanks " you shyly answered , she was directly facing you , almost a head taller than you , you know she always was tall to you but never that big. Sophia never felt this tall since the time she had a growing spurt during her teenage years. Recently you slowly caught back the height difference, since she was stabilising now...Yet something felt odd, she was definately taller... You looked at her feet to be sure she wast wearing heels or something but she clearly was barefooted.
"Are you all right ?" she suddenly asked
"Yeah yeah it's nothing I'm just a bit sleepy"
She didn't see you often but was surprised to see you were smaller she remembered .You on the other side was really hating yourself for being this small, even at 16 years old, you were still way smaller than your big sister and won't for sure be her height ever.


The two of you then ate your meal ,something was weird , you remained silence still not understanding why everything is bigger and began to really be worried by this .Your big sister's big feet often kicked you or touched you while she moved her long legs under the table , she didn't realized it was your leg she rubbed but you just shyly kept on eating .
Lost in your thoughts you finally thought the only thing you had in common with her was your last name, she was tall, successful and really smart, your mother's pride , you on the other side was always scolded and disappointed your family... While you could barely touch a bowl in a too high closet her long legs could go through the whole table and let her feet land on you.

You didn't finish your bowl and decided you had to be sure of what was happening , you stood up , did the dishes to please your big sister then headed to the bathroom, you finally found the gut to check your height then stayed in awe when you saw it
5'2" you were smaller !... Impossible , you had to breath for a bit , really taken aback from the news. You were smaller than the average 14 years old kids , even your little sister was only an inch smaller than you ! Oh god , you can't let her see that, you know her too good and if she usually mocked at you and teased you, there will be nothing to stop her if you get even smaller.She will for sure use her height to torment you .you were a bit exagering the situation and you were aware of that, this phenomenon surprised you so much you couldn't think straight

Once you gathered your spirit back you thought about the best way to prevent further shrinking. You could go to a doctor or go on the internet maybe you should tell your family about it ?
111.title: (Slow shrinking ) going downstairs to eat

choices: Isabel and Sallie are here and torments you
Lillian comes back and you ask her to hide your disease to anyone
Isabel is alone and you see her play with your ps4
1111.content:
Fortunately, after some minutes of waiting, the doctor answered.

"Dr.Laina Rogers here"

"Doctor, I...I'm very sick , I need an appointment ! Now !"

The doctor couldn't refuse anything to Lillian's son, so she accepted and told you to come right now.


Once you were in her office, she began to pass some tests on you and you explained what happened.

"I see... Well I'm sorry to tell you that but you have what is called H7O3, or the shrinking disease."

"No...No... I...I'm going to die ? How many times do I have before I do ?!"

"Well, there still is little chance for the disease to stop, but you'll basically get younger everydays and shrink"

"What do you mean get younger ?! I'm gonna become a baby ?!"

"No , no , nothing like that, but you'll hmm...It's hard to tell you but as you shrink your body will have to adjust to the changes and will be modified, and so will be your brains as it shrinks further ... It could basically make you forget everything you learned..."

"No...No...No !!! It can't be happening to me !!! NO !!!"
You fell in tears as you learnt the news,

"I'm sorry... But listen there is still hope, it has been seen before that subjects that stay happy and keep confidence are less affected by it, maybe you'll manage to fight it back too !"

Seeing it didn't comfort you she took her phone and called your mother to explain her the whole thing.

Depressed, you went back to your house.
1111.title: Call your doctor ( he shrinks everyday )

choices: Cassandra, your aunt would keep things secret.
1113.content:
The phone quivering in your hand, you quickly call up your best friend, Natalie, to see if her mom might have an idea of what was going on here.

"Hey, Jake! How have you been doing?"

"Hey Natalie, listen. . I have this problem and. . I need your help with it."

"Eww. . . maybe this is one of those things you should just. . .talk to a guy about."

"No, not that!! I. . I am not well."

"What do you mean?"

"I mean. . . I mean, I woke up and. . I'm shorter than I was."

There was silence for a second. You sat there quietly, lost in thought for a moment too.

"Are you joking? This has to be a joke. Normal people. . they don't get smaller. I mean, when they get older, sometime they lost bone structure and. . "

What if that was it? What if you were losing bone structure?

"Do you. . do you think. . your mother could run. . some kind of test on me?"

"Hmm. . . couldn't you go to a doctor or something?"

"I don't want everyone at the house knowing that. . that I am shrinking!! It isn't okay!! I am kinda freaking out about all of this."

"Well, she would only do it, if you brought an adult with you too. I am not sure if you would be okay with that, but. . that might be the only way."

"Okay, okay!! Ugh. . .alright. Tell your mom we'll be right over."

"Okay, be careful, Jake!!"

You hung up the phone and thought about it for a little while. Who would you bring with you to go see Natalie's mom for the test?
1113.title: Call Natalie for advice.

choices: No , sorry honey but you have to watch over your sister.
11132.content:
You dialed your aunt's number, it was the only alternative that didn't impy telling your mother or sisters.

"Hi...Alex ? Why are you calling that early ?" Her voice sounded kind of dizzy.

You were back in your room, while everyone else in his family ate .
"H..Hi Cassandra, listen I need your help , now ! It's a matter of second !"

"Hm ?...At this early in the morning ? what's the problem Jake ?"

"Just wait for me I'm coming."


Reassured she was awake, you rushed to Cassandra's house, his heart beating, will you shrink even more ?


When you were at the front door, it was Laura who opened. Your face turned red as you saw your mean-rival cousin taller than you now.
"Woa, hi Jake, what are you..." She said before you cut her from speaking and pushed her aside to enter the room.
You were stunned to see she was clearly 3 inches taller than you now,you always were on competition in the past and giving her this pleasure bothered you.You wanted to supress that smile from her face but didn't have time to , in fact your aunt was in the living room, and stood as she saw you coming.

"Oh Jake, how are you ?So what did you want to tell me I don't understand "

"Hi , could we go in a ....more private place ?"

Cassandra looked surprised, she thought it must be something really serious you wanted to tell her.

"Yeah, sure "

She stood up and you understood she found out what was wrong by seeing her face depicting your reduced body .You were kind of taken aback to see her that tall, she was kind of intimidating now.
You saw Laura and Bianca giggling and whispering while peeping at you.

Once the two of you were alone in your aunt bedroom she spoke first.
"So what happened ? You look ...weird"

Thank god she didn't see...

You explained her the whole thing and she meazured your size, to be sure of it, you trully felt small when she stood up to compare height.
Luckily, she accepted to drive you to your friend, Natalie.

Before both of you left the house Cassandra spoke to her daughters,
"Ok girls, I count on you to be carefull and to stay quiet while I'm driving Jake to his friend ok ?"

"Why is it not Lillian who is driving him ?" Bianca asked.

"B..Because she's busy." You stattered.

"Are you smaller ?" Her words stopped your heart for a second.

"N...No..." You grabbed Cassandra's T-shirt in order to make her leave the house.
Before you could Laura said something too.

"Mom , can I come with you ?"
11132.title: Cassandra, your aunt would keep things secret.

choices: "But first. . .I have some errands to run!!"
111321.content:
Laura beamed when she heard her mother agree to allow her to go too. Meanwhile, you were shocked. The whole reason that you asked your aunt to get you instead of your mother was so that a lot of people wouldn't find out about this. Now, Laura would be coming with you too!! Since she was already taller than you at your normal height, you didn't think she had noticed yet, but once she did. . . she would definitely try and take advantage of you.

"Yay!! I get to go!!"

Bianca made an angry face at her sister who was now raising her hands up in victory, the thought that she would go and not her was ridiculous. Besides, she was certain that the only reason that Jake needed to 'go somewhere' was due to his new height. He must have been sick with something. .

"Mom!! What about me!! Don't I get to go, too?!?" Bianca whined to her mother.

Cassandra turned, a soft smile on her face, and nodded.

"Sure, why not!! Go and get your things because Jake has an appointment that he can't miss!!"

The girls ran off to get there things and you turn and look up at your now taller aunt Cassandra.

"Aunt Cassandra!! I. . I kind of wanted to keep all of this on the downlow. With them all coming too, they are going to find out about my. . . little problem."

Cassandra patted you on the head, while you felt inferior as she did this. You pushed her hand away while she replied.

"Oh come now. . I now that you are scared but everything will be alright. Don't you worry. We are here for you!!"

With that, your aunt reached her hands behind you and brought you in for a deep hug. Her breasts smashed against your face, making it difficult to breathe. You tried to push her away from you, but she was too strong. Where you shrinking again!!

"I'm here for you. . . you are going to be okay!!"

After she pulled you back away, you let out a breath fast, having had trouble breathing. Cassandra looked at you strangely. . there was something different about you. Before she could figure it out, her daughters re-entered the room and told their mother for you.

"Oh my god!! Look at him!! He shrank while we were gone!!" Laura exclaimed, stunned at the revelation.

"See, I told you!!! He is getting smaller!!" Bianca said too.

"Stop pestering him!! Yes, he is getting smaller, but we are going to go help him out!! Come on, everyone pile into the car."

The girls rushed to the vehicle while you tagged behind, begrudgingly. You didn't like where this was going. You walked over to the front seat passenger side and. .

Wham!!

Bianca knocked you down and you hit the grass. . .hard. Your head hurt from such a forceful impact.

"Hey!! I get the front seat!!" Bianca yelled, her hands on her hips. You nodded, still dazed as you got yourself off the ground and opened the back seat door. Laura had already gotten in the car. She gave you a smile that looked as if it said that she was "happy" to see you there. You didn't like that either.

"Alright girls, let's go!!" Cassandra started the car.
111321.title: A family endeavor

choices: Decide to stick with your aunt and her errands instead.
Call Natalie to come up with a plan.
1113211.content:
Your eyes grew wide with shock!!

Errands?!?

You didn't know how long Natalie's mom would be at her lab!! If these errands took too long. . you might not get to see her until next Monday!! That would mean the weekend as you slowly shrank down to nothing!!

"Uhh. . . " you stuttered out, anxiety gripping you hard.

"Aunt Cassandra. . .is there anyway. . . we could do these errands later? It's just. . .I don't know. . how long I have with Natalie's mother. See, that is. . "

"SHUT UP, TWERP!!"

Bianca let out a barrage of loud words which immediately stopped you from saying anything else. She smiled at you, as she realized how much weaker you had gotten since then.

"Now now, Bianca!! You be nice, but. . she is also right. These errands won't take too long, you'll be at your meeting just fine!!"

You rubbed the back of your head and looked to your side. Laura had been staring at you, noticing that you had gotten even smaller. At this rate, you must have been a foot shorter than she was, so even while seated she actually had to look down at you.

Laura noticed that you had looked at her. She smiled an ice cold smile as she reshuffled her hair behind her back. Quietly, she unbuckled her seat belt and scooted herself closer to where you were sitting.

"Hey!!" She said in a dominating tone.

"Hey." You replied, a little worried and a little uncomfortable with her being so close.

She leaned towards you, her body scent wafting in her nose. She smelled like cherries. . either her soap or maybe some kind of hair spray.

"I just wanted to let you know something." She said quietly, being sure that her mother and sister couldn't hear her in the meantime.

You were getting a little freaked out. You didn't like how she was acting.

"W-w. . w-what is it?"

Laura put her arm besides your torso and pulled you really close to her. Her head was now directly over you as she rocked your face like it was a baby.

"I'm going to hurt you!! I'm going to hurt you really badly. But. . . your going to like it . . .and your going to ask me for more when I'm done. Okay?"

You started to sweat, fear filling your eyes. With that, she smiled again and pushed herself back to where she was. You had to get out of here!! Suddenly, an idea popped in your head!! Your cell phone!! Maybe, just maybe. . .you could use it to get yourself out of this mess. The car pulled over and the women got out of the car. You were at a Staples, an office supply store.

"Don't worry, Jake!! I just need to pick up a fax and we will be on our way. See!! Nothing to worry about."
1113211.title: "But first. . .I have some errands to run!!"

choices: "Oh nothing, Jake!! Let's go to your meeting!!"
"Oh. . .your aunt Eva needs us to get her!!"
11132111.content:
You bit your lip and looked at your phone silently as you got out of the car. It would only be a little while longer. It was just a fax, that would only last for a few minutes. What could possibly happen in all that time? You decided just to stick with the original plan. Opening your phone, you opened up your contacts and got to Natalie. With a few quick swipes, you sent her a message.

Be there soon. Picking up a fax.

Ok, but don't be too long.

Mom has a meeting later.

Ok I will tell my aunt

Putting the phone away, you rush over to where your aunt and your cousins where, looking at all the different office equipment and other things.

"Hey, Aunt Cassandra!! Listen, so. . ."

Your aunt put her hand over your mouth, stopping you from speaking. After this, she got behind you and hugged your back while she put her hands on your chest, rubbing them up and down. It actually felt nice, although it was a little weird, given it was your aunt that was doing it to you.

"Jake. . .what did I tell you." She said sternly.

"You said. . .said not to. . ."

She stopped rubbing and gave you a vice like hug as she held you tightly to her. It was hard, and it actually cut off your air, making it hard to breathe.

"Ghggghhhh. . . " You sputtered, unable to speak.

"What did I say, Jake?!?"

She released you and began to sooth you again, rubbing her hands up and down again.

"N-not. . n-not to worry. E-everything. . e-everything would be. . f-fine." you said hesitantly, a little afraid of her at this point.

"Exactly!!!"

She let you go and moved in front of you again, patting your head once more.

"Now, you just let me go ahead and get that fax. . and we'll help your. . .little problem, okay!!"

She walked off, leaving you staring silently. Maybe you should have called Natalie, instead. You swallowed a little, and went over to the clearance software. Usually, it was nothing good, just old computer games that nobody likes anymore. But occasionally. . they had new titles. . and really cheap. That, or obscure good titles too.

As you turned to look through the software, your eyes grew wide!!!

Metal Fatigue!!

Metal Fatigue is an old computer game about three warring factions led by three brothers. Basically, the world finds out that these aliens had giant robots that they used to fight, live in, etc. So, these factions create their own versions of them, to try and see if they can use them too. It was really cool, because you could customize your giant robots and even rip off enemy robot pieces to use for yourself.

You couldn't believe it. . and only 10 dollars.

"Give me that!!"

Bianca turned around the corner and snatched the game from your hands. At this point, she was now also a foot higher than you. . making you about 4 feet tall!!

"Giant robots!! You are looking at a game with giants in it!! Don't you have real giants to worry about, you twerp!!" Bianca said as she laughed. You tried to grab the game from her hand, but she lifted it high into the air.

"Not so fast!! Do you really think your stronger than me now!! Your just going to keep shrinking!! Shrinking until your the size of a bug!! You know what I do to bugs!!"

You swallowed, not liking where this was going.

"I crush them!! And if you don't do what I say. . I'm going to crush you too!!"

With that, she left with your game, laughing the entire time. You made a face and started towards the counter toward your aunt, who was getting the fax. Your aunt was making a face after receiving the fax, and you were a little worried about that.

"Aunt Cassandra, what's wrong?"
11132111.title: Shanghaied!

111321112.content:
"Oh. . your aunt Eva needs us to go pick her up!!"

Your eyes are practically popping out of your head at this point. Laura and Bianca are behind you, laughing at the realization that again, you have been stopped from meeting Natalie's mother.

Laura grabs your cheeks and give them a hard pinch as she brings your face close to hers.

"Don't worry, little Jake!! I promise not to hurt you too badly!!"

Your aunt smiled, only hearing the first part of what Laura had said to her.

"That is right, Jake!! Listen to your cousin, Laura!! She is absolutely right!!" Aunt Cassandra said proudly.

Laura and Bianca giggled more as you didn't like the idea of another car ride with your cousins.

Your aunt surprised all of you when she literally jumped into the air.

"I know!!" She said happily.

"Because we have to go somewhere else again. . . I'll get you all some delicious ice cream!!"

Ice cream!?! ICE CREAM!! You were already going to be so late. What if you didn't get seen at all. You didn't want to keep shrinking like this. . . slowly thoughout the day. And what if. . what if it never stopped. What if you shrank into. . nothing. This was a serious matter that your aunt and cousins were not treating seriously at all. This had to stop and stop now!!

"Ummm. . . Aunt Cassandra. . maybe. . ."

WHAP!!

Laura slapped you as hard as she could on the back of your head, knocking you straight onto the ground. Cassandra and Bianca turned to look at what happened, the two women looking to Laura for answers.

"Oh no!!" Laura said, with an expression of fake concern, "Jake, I'm sorry I bumped into you!! I guess I'm not used to you being so small!!"

Cassandra looked at Laura and gave her an icy stare. She suspected that may not have been an accident.

"Laura!! Don't you start with me!! And as for you, Jake!! You need to be careful where you are going!! You are much more fragile like this, understand!!"

You shook your head, trying hard not to cry at this point. You were being used to badly. You wished you had just asked your mom to help from the beginning.

The four of you walked into the nearby ice cream parlour, next to the Staples. A row of 25 different ice cream flavors lit up all around the store. Nearby the flavors where cups that one could put the ice cream in. After getting the ice cream, you would just go to the front, weigh it there, and pay for it. Your cousins and aunt each grabbed a cup and went through the store looking at all the different flavors.

Your aunt tried a little of the black cherry. She shivered.

"Wow, that flavor was way too bitter."

You decided that at this point, you might as well just get some ice cream. You reached up for a cup and. . . oh no. You. . you couldn't reach it. It was. .. was too high.

"Hey ma'am!!"

A pretty young lady with black hair stood besides you. She must have been the person you bought the ice cream from.

"Hey!! Your little boy will need some help getting the flavors!!"

She reached above you and handed you the cup. Walking back, she stood behind the counter. Your aunt and cousins came back, their cups filled up already with plenty of ice cream.

"Oh Jake!! What now!!" Cassandra said, annoyed at your inability to get your own ice cream.

"I. . I can't reach." you said gently.

"No, mom. . no!!" Bianca said, her hands on her hip again. "He doesn't get Ice cream when we do, he shouldn't get any ice cream!!"

Cassandra scratched her head. You could tell she was actually considering this. Really. She was the one who added an extra detour. And you still hadn't even met up with your aunt Eva yet too.

"Well. . .you did take too long, Jake!! Sorry, no ice cream for you!!"

You looked on with extreme anger as your cousins laughed as Aunt Cassandra got in line to get the ice cream. You couldn't take it anymore!!! You had to call someone to get yourself out of this mess. Reaching into your phone, you considered doing what you were thinking from earlier. Just calling Natalie. She had to have some kind of plan. Maybe she could get someone to come get you. Than again. . .

On the other hand, your original reason for coming with your aunt in the first place, privacy, had been thrown out the door. You had been to so many places and so many people had seen you small that it was bound to get back to mom anyway. Maybe you should just call your mom and have her pick you up. Then at least you would make your meeting.
111321112.title: I Scream, You Scream

choices: You finally all arrive at Aunt Eva's
You decide to try and reach Natalie again.
1113211122.content:
Looking over, the ice cream line was quite long. . and your mother wasn't too far from here. In fact, her office was like two blocks down, maybe a five minute drive. You dialed your mother and listened as the ring tone buzzed. It went to voice mail. You redialed a second time, waiting to hear from her now.

Still nothing.

What was going on? Why wasn't she answering the phone?

You dialed a third time, this time getting more and more impatient. You needed help and your mother wasn't coming at all. Still nothing!! What the heck. It was so weird.

Suddenly, your phone started to buzz. Your mom!! She must have been busy. Quickly, you answered the phone.

"Hey mom. . "

"Jake!! I was in a very important meeting!!! You better be dying because if I lose this contract, you aren't going to be having a Christmas this year!!"

"Mom, listen, I. . "

"You know how incredibly busy, I am!! I know it is the weekend, but you also know I have an extra meeting today!! Why couldn't you have just called your sisters!!"

"I know, I know. . but listen it's import. . "

"What!! What is so important!!"

You started to shake and tear up again. Why was everyone being so harsh towards you.

"Mom. . . I'm in trouble. . I need your help!! I need to see Natalie's mom. I am very sick!!"

Silence filled the phone as you heard rustling and motion on the other end. Suddenly, a loud whoosh was on the phone line. Your mom was outside.

"Where are you. . I'm on my way."

You smiled, relieved at last. Quickly, you told your mother and heard her nice car start up. Finally, you would be getting to that meeting with Natalie's mom.

You sat at the front of the store, when finally your aunt showed up with your cousins, ice creams and spoons in hand.

"Hey Jake, we are going to finish these ice creams before we go get your aunt. But after that. . we will take you to that meeting. Don't worry about it!!" Cassandra said. . .for the millionth time. At this point it was getting ridiculous.

"Little Jakey doesn't get any ice cream!!! Ha ha!!" Bianca said, with ice cream in her mouth. It looked gross. Laura was quiet, silently disposing of her ice cream and sending it down into her stomach. She smiled though at your humiliation.

Vroom. . . . screech.

Your mother's car stopped in front of you, your aunt, and your cousins as your mom rolled down the window.

"Okay, what is going on with. . . oh my god!! Jake!!! You must be about 3 feet tall!!! What happened to you!!"

Your aunt, the spoon still in her mouth, looked a little sheepish. It was like for the first moment, she had realized that this was indeed a very serious thing. That. . .it could have extreme consequences to your life and livelihood. In essence, a light bulb over her head moment.

"I. . . I was about to take him to. . his meeting about that." Your aunt said sheepishly.

"Well, Cassandra!! What do you have to say for yourself!! Why haven't you taken him over there yet!!" your mother demanded, rage filled in her voice. Finally, someone fighting for your side.

"Lillian.. I" Cassandra handed your mother the fax who looked at it. Her eyes grew large again.

"Oh no. . Eva. . again!! I am getting tired of this."

"Listen, Lillian. . I can take care of this. You go get your boy to that meeting. Then we can all meet up and deal with this together."

Your mother shook her head. "No, Cassandra. We need to deal with this together. Come on. . .we need to go now. All of you can squeeze into my company car."

No, no, no!!! What was on that fax that was so important that your own family would go to see Aunt Eva over you? You were getting tired of this. You just couldn't take this.

"Mom!! What about me!!"

"You need to shove it!! We don't have a lot of time, I am really stressed out right now!! I promise, we will get you taken care of!! Now, let's go!!"

Aunt Cassandra got into the front side passenger seat as you squeezed between your cousins. The car was quiet on the way, no fighting or squabbling. No torture either, which you could appreciate. You felt like you were driving for awhile, too.
1113211122.title: Motherly Assistance

choices: You finally make it to the lab!!
11132111221.content:
The doors open and your mother, aunt, and Bianca all storm out of the car. At this point, you were only about two feet tall!! Laura reached down for you and after getting herself out of the car, picked you up and carried you.

"Heh heh. . look what I have!!" She said with a smile. Carefully and methodically, she started to squeeze your legs slowly. The pain hurt and you tried to yelp in pain, but Laura covered your mouth.

"Laura!! Come on. . we have to hurry!!" Cassandra yelled from afar.

Laura leaned close to you and spit into your face.

"Looks like you got a get out of jail card!! You better enjoy it. . because I'm going to hurt you so much more!!"

With that, she dropped you and you slammed onto the ground. Laura walked away, leaving you to figure out where exactly you were. Getting up, you realized you were on a dirt road. Where the heck where you at? Maybe now, you would finally find out what that fax was about. Or at least, figure out away to get to Natalie's mom. You walked past the car and saw a small building. You must have been out in the desert somewhere. Or something.

Your mother slammed on the door.

"Come out, Eva!! I'm serious!! We know what you did!!"

What she did? What was your mother. .

The door opened up and you saw your aunt Eva's head pop out from the house.

"Who's there?"

Cassandra looked at her annoyed. Placing her hands on her hip, very similarly to how Bianca does, she started off.

"You know just well who is here!! Look at what you did!!"

She pointed towards. . you? Oh no. . she couldn't have.

Eva's eyes grew wide. She opened the strange door and motioned for you all to come inside.

____________________________________________________________________________ _______

Inside the small building, was a lab. You knew that Aunt Eva was studying at MIT, but you didn't think. . she was actually that smart!!! She had all kinds of inventions and doodads. But something really stood out. It was a weird looking apple. You remembered that in your weird dream this morning. . you had eaten that. It was good, but made you feel strange.

"I'm sorry, I didn't think it would have that affect on him!! But. . I can't reverse his size and he is only going to shrink more and more."

Eva picked you up and put you on a table. Your clothes hadn't fit for awhile now, but you had been tying them together and ripping parts off to make it kind of work for you. You looked bad.

"I think. . . that I know of a place we can take him too."

The family leaned in to listen.

"Do you know Jake's friend Natalie? Her mother has a lab that has what we need."

What!!

Natalie's. . . mom's lab. You. . you couldn't believe it. You had only been trying to get there the entire time.

Quickly, the three sisters, your cousins, and you all squeezed into the car and made their way back towards your friend's lab. Only time would tell if you made it or not.

You were surrounded by giants now. even one of Laura's hand was bigger than your torso. And you kept on shrinking. She gently rubbed your little head with one of her finger, surprised to feel that you looked at her and your heart stopped when you saw her cold stare looking down at you, you didn't even want to think of what she wanted to do.

Bianca , decided to finally talk to you, "Listen twerp, once you are healed, you'll be all mine ! you'd rather ask your mother to stay with us or there are high chances you end up accidentally squished. got it ?"
You slowly nodded your head in fear of the giant teenage girl. Laura however talked back, "You meant he was going to be mine ? Hm ?"

Everything was dark, stale and cold.

Bianca had left a balled up gym sock in the opening of the boot, blocking out any stray light that made it through the slats in the door of the hallway shoe closet where her boots, and her pet Toejam, lived when they weren't being used by their owner.

She wasn't worried about escape attempts. Her pet had been so timid in resisting his new diet that he had grown involuntarily accustomed to it. He started to mentally link the cessation of hunger with cleaning his master's feet of grime; thirst was solved by sucking on one of his owner's sweaty socks, or licking the salty perspiration that slicked Cassandra's toes after she had been at the gym. Bianca wasn't concerned that Toejam would try to run away, she had simply forgotten where she left her pet, having not thought about him for a day. He was being trained.

The previous afternoon, Laura kicked off this training. Glancing up from her phone, Laura watched Toejam crawl between her sister's toes, nibbling at crusty dead skin and gnawing on her calluses. He hadn't even been given the command from his master to eat.. Noticing that the family pet had, indeed, survived on nothing but gunk from their feet, she nonchalantly said to Bianca,

'If Toejam wants food, he should earn it.'
'Why?' asked Bianca, 'I love when it licks under my toenails, it tickles - and it's Toejam's favourite food.'
'Exactly,' replied Laura, with cold indifference to her pet's humiliating diet, 'eating our toejam is a reward - like a dog treat - you should only let it eat after…' she paused, considering a suitable chore for the pathetic creature. Three days previously, after complaining about the cold nights, Bianca had shrunk Toejam down to less than an inch and had him sleep in between her toes during the night. Since then he had only grown, after begging for permission, back to about three inches, seemingly unable to go any further.
After a moment, Laura continued 'you should only let Toejam eat after he's cleaned the insoles of those gross old boots of yours.'
Bianca's eyes lit up. 'That's a great idea - and I can teach him to beg at the same time.'
Laura gave a slight smirk at the insignificant squeaks coming from in between her sister's toes before returning to her phone.

Bianca plucked her squeaking pet from between her grimy toes and brought him to the hallway shoe closet, where she unceremoniously dumped him into the cavernous mouth of her foul-smelling boots. A wave of musty air hit Toejam's nostrils as he landed on the filthy insole with a moist, squelching sound. Gaining his feet and craning his neck to look up to the dank opening of the boot, Toejam saw his owner's grinning face loom above. Having heard all of his master's conversation about the future of his training, Toejam knew what Bianca's command would be. She spoke anyway, continuing to treat him like a dumb animal she had to patiently teach.

'THESE ARE, LIKE, MY FAVOURITE BOOTS, BUT THE INSOLES HAVE DIRTY TOE PRINTS ON THEM. YOU CAN HAVE YOUR FAVOURITE TREAT WHEN YOU'VE LICKED THEM CLEAN.' His master's voice boomed from above, making his body literally shake with the vibrations.
Hearing high-pitched squeaks of protest from the grimy heel of her boot, Bianca boomed again
'YOU KNOW I CAN'T HEAR YOUR STUPID LITTLE MOUSE VOICE. IF YOU DON'T STOP BEING SO UNGRATEFUL I WON'T FEED YOU UNTIL YOU CLEAN THE SWEAT STAINS FROM MOM'S GYM SOCKS.'
To Bianca's slight surprise, the squeals from her boot immediately stopped. 'It's working,' she thought, 'he'll be on his knees, begging me to let him eat the grime from under my toenails by next week.'
Grinning even wider, Bianca tilted the boot, sending Toejam tumbling towards the toe section, before she replaced it in the closet and went back to watching tv with her sister.

'Hey mom, have you seen Toejam?'

It was early afternoon and Bianca had just returned home from visiting a friend. Her hair was soft and damp from the warm weather outside, and she puffed a frizzy curl away from her eyes as she entered the living room to greet her mother.

'Hi sweetheart,' said Cassandra, watching television as she relaxed in a large chair with a glass of wine. 'Laura had it last, so if she hasn't put it back in your boot in the closet then you'll have to ask her. I think she's upstairs.'

Tramping up the stairs to her sisters' room Bianca felt her feet squelch in her sneakers. She had walked some miles in the summer heat and her socks were already saturated and uncomfortable; she was looking forward to having her pet fix that.
Loud pop music filtered through to the upstairs hallway as Bianca approached Laura's bedroom door to knock on it.

'Come in,' came the reply, 'I'm just doing my yoga.'

Bianca opened the bedroom door to see her older sister bent double on her yoga mat; Laura returned to her feet and slowly lowered herself into the splits, bright green yoga pants clashing with her dyed red hair as they stretched, nearly to exhaustion, over the span of her legs. The sweltering heat hadn't made it passed the air conditioning, but Laura was still sweating profusely, always taking her workout seriously.

'Have you got Toejam? It's super hot outside and my feet are sooo gross'
'Yeah, I'm using it.'
Bianca's eyes dropped to her sister's bare feet and said 'What do you mean? Where is he?'
Laura had risen to her feet and continued to touch her toes.
'It was taking too long cleaning under my toenails this morning, and mom said that I haven't taught it any new tricks in a while, so I decided it should learn to kiss my butt.'

'I have to deal with the smell from keeping it in your swampy boots - your feet are the worst. And besides, I don't want it to think that you're its only master so it has to learn my scent too.'
Laura smirked as she began deliberately clenching and unclenching her buttcheeks to make her little sister cringe.
'Did he do as he was told? What does it feel like?'
'It's so tiny I could barely feel it at first, but after a bit of punishment it learned to put its back into it. It's nice - it kinda tickles.'
'That's awesome,' said Bianca, now laughing at her pet's new trick, 'put him back in my boot when you're done - and he better not smell like ass when I want to use him.'
'Fine, I'll rinse it off when I'm finished.'
Bianca rolled her eyes and left the bedroom.

Toejam was in crushing agony, but he continued to obey his master. Earlier in the day he was awoken violently as Laura shook the boot he lived in and tipped it upside down, sending the family pet tumbling down into her hand. She brought him to her bedroom and sat down at her desk, dropping her pet into a pair of slippers.
'What do you say?' she said, inserting a foot into an empty slipper.
Toejam did as he was trained and begged for permission to eat from between his master's toes.
'Good boy,' said Laura, stifling a yawn, 'you may eat your breakfast - make sure you get all the sludge under my toenails.' With her command Laura grasped her pet in between toes and brought her foot into the remaining slipper. Feeling Toejam start working immediately, she stopped paying attention to her pet and began chatting to friends on her laptop.

No more than an hour later Toejam felt his master's toes curl around him again, withdrawing him from the slipper; Laura's gigantic fingers casually plucked him from her salty toes and rocketed him upwards towards her waist. Before Toejam knew what was happening - he was still blinded by the sudden return to the morning light - Laura had pulled back her yoga pants and summarily dropped her pet between her cheeks. As Toejam began to recognize where he was, he heard his master's voice booming above, and now all around him:
'You were taking way too long to do even one toenail, so I'm gonna teach you a new trick. Start kissing my butt until I tell you to stop. And keep doing what you were trained for - lick up any sweat you can find while I do my yoga. If I don't feel you straight away you're going to be a suppository for the rest of the week.'
Laura gave a rare smile as she felt the faint tickle of Toejam obeying her.

Doing his best to please his master, Toejam shuddered with terror as the leggings were pulled back once again and Laura's huge finger was hovered above him. Slowly but firmly it moved towards him until it had pressed him against the oily flesh surrounding him as Laura used her pet to scratch her ass.
'I can barely feel any kissing, put your back into it, buttmunch - that could be your new name!' she said as she retracted her finger and began to stretch; Laura smiled as she felt her desperate pet strain his neck to obey.

After some hours of excruciating pressure and Laura's sweat, Toejam heard Bianca enter the bedroom and felt a slight twinge of hope at being rescued, but he didn't pause from his job. Shortly after he felt his entire world turn into chaos, the mountainous cheeks surrounding him began to undulate and move, tossing and turning him in his prison. Scared of displeasing Laura he did his best to continue kissing and licking with all his energy and miniature might.

After hours of kissing, Toejam was once again plucked up by Laura's fingers and dropped into the palm of her hand. Before he could gain his senses or his balance he was deluged in ice cold water as Laura quickly rinsed her pet in the sink.
Finding himself in transit in Laura's palm once more he found her hand tipping him out as it hovered over...
121111112111122212111111211112.title: Another day of the week

1211111121111222121111112111121.content:
Toejam sat on his knees in the darkness and overwhelming smell of Bianca's boot. He had rolled down into the toe section after Laura casually dropped him into the musty opening of the boot before wrinkling her nose and tossing it back into the shoe closet. Toejam crawled into one of the faint indents of the insole; deep, curved grooves the size of his entire body that had been worn away by Bianca's toes, just like his battered and sweat-soaked body. He started absentmindedly licked the rubbery floor around him, thinking of the relative safety between Bianca's toes.

Living, as he had, in constant fear of punishment for arbitrary failures or invented disobedience, isolation was more worrying than the prospect of routine torment. He felt strangely soothed by the familiar smell of Bianca's feet and wondered with concern about how long it would take him to get used to the smell and taste of Laura using him to scratch her ass.
'What am I thinking?' he thought in a sudden fit of paranoia for even considering his master in a negative light, 'Laura said if she ever heard me complain again she'd put me in her mom's pedegg and not open it until I had eaten everything inside.' He unconsciously doubled the speed of his lapping and wondered how long he had been in there this time around, hoping that his masters would need him again soon.

In the early morning Toejam had been smothered in the rank darkness of Laura's slippers, licking between her toes, and he spent the afternoon plastered to her yoga pants, kissing her ass while she exercised. The entire day he had seen only minutes of daylight and had lost track of time.

As he drifted into rare moment of sleep, hypnotised by the rhythms of his own lapping at his master's sweaty toe prints, Toejam was startled awake by a gut wrenching metallic creak, followed by a catastrophic crash that bounced around the boot and seemed to come from everywhere. Bianca had opened the closet door.
'OH MY GOD, SHE WAS ACTUALLY THERE?'
Toejam heard his master's voice.
'She must be on the pho...' the thought was interrupted as he was slammed into the moist ground before getting tossed hard into the leather walls of the surrounding boot and tumbling violently down again into the blinding light and onto the carpeted hallway floor.
Trying to regain his balance he flinched at the thunder crash behind him as Bianca discarded her empty boot and closed the door to the closet. Toejam craned his neck to see his giant master's face, but she didn't look down at him but rather started walking towards the living room and talking on her phone.
'DOESN'T SHE KNOW THAT, LIKE, NOBODY LIKES HER? SHE'S SUCH A --' Bianca whistled and patted her backside and said 'HERE BOY!'
Toejam immediately sprinted after his master.
'OH NOTHING, I WAS JUST CALLING MY PET, TOEJAM -- WHAT WAS SHE WEARING?'

When Toejam finally arrived in the livingroom his master was already seated on the sofa, still not bothering to address him directly. He hurried up to Bianca's bare feet and started kissing and licking her big toe. She continued speaking on the phone, but after some minutes she splayed open her toes and made a short series of soft clicking sounds - one of the many commands and signals Laura had forced him to learn when she was bored. He lunged into work between her toes without thinking, licking the summer sweat and nibbling at patches of softened dead skin. Bianca had been out in the sun all day and her feet were radiating heat. Big chunks of black sock fuzz, saturated in acrid sweat tumbled onto Toejam and rivulets of sweat dripped constantly onto his face and into his eyes.
'WHILE YOU'RE GONE, ASK YOUR SISTER ABOUT HER NEW BOYFRIEND. I HEARD HE'S FROM OUT OF TOWN.' There was a short pause, where Toejam did his job in silence, before his master finally spoke to him directly,
'BE A GOOD LITTLE PAIR OF NAIL CLIPPERS AND TRIM MY TOENAILS. EAT ALL THE GUNK FIRST SO THEY'RE CLEAN THEN CHEW MY TOENAILS UNTIL THEY'RE CLEAN. YOU'LL BE PAINTING THEM LATER SO MAKE SURE THA-- OH HEY! WHAT DID SHE SAY?' Bianca returned to her phone call and ignoring her pet.
Not daring to hesitate, Toejam started gnawing at the tough, dead skin on the rims of Bianca's toenails. He bobbed his head under the nail of her big toe, trying to bite chunks out of thick, sticky dirt caked to the underside like mud on the wheel arch of a rally car. It felt like trying to eat black, vinegar soaked clay, and it immediately coated his mouth and tongue with an overwhelmingly strong tasting oily residue, but he forced himself to chew and swallow every bite. Toejam tried to zone out the booming phone conversation above him, determined to finish in record time and please his master.

'--I'M NOT GETTING IN A CAR WITH HIM AGAIN, WE'LL NEED TO FIND ANOTHER RIDE. OH HANG ON...'
1211111121111222121111112111121.title: Bianca's boot

choices: 2 days later: Cassandra invites people to stay tonight
Contitnue... Toejam feels his body shrink again
12111111211112221211111121111212.content:
Cassandra opened the front door, her face, reddened and soaked with sweat highlighted the intense gym session she just went through.
"HI MOM" Bianca said before going back on her phone.
"HI HON, IS TOEJAM FREE? I'M IN NEED OF A GOOD FOOT SESSION WITH IT." This wasn't an unusual request, Cassandra had found a peculliar pleasure in using the family pet once a day, as a treat after a hard session. She believed it was an effective way of relax her foot muscles after a good run, and if at first she doubted it's hability to help with it's puny size, he had managed to impress her with the hard work it was putting on it's duty.
"MOM I'VE JUST STARTED WITH HIM! CAN'T YOU TAKE IT LATER? IT'S LIKE, ON NAIL CLIPPING DUTY AT THE MOMENT" Bianca answered in her annoyed bratty voice.
"HONEY, YOU KNOW I ONLY USE IT FOR A FOOT RELAXATION SESSION, YOU AND YOUR SISTERS CAN HAVE HIM THE WHOLE DAY LONG. DON'T YOU WANNA MAKE YOUR MOMMY HAPPY?"
"MOM! I'M AT THE PHONE!" Bianca answered with an embarrased face while covering her phone, she then removed her hand and rolled her eyes as she flicked Toejam, annoyed in a slight gesture of her foot. "Uuughh. FINE. YOU CAN HAVE IT." She disapeared with loud booming annoyed steps in the corridor.

Toejam got picked up by two of Cassandra's thin and long fingers and rose way up. The woman then sat on her favorite relaxing chair and pressed on a device. The chair moved in order to have her legs laid right in front of her and her back slightly in behind.
Toejam was placed on her muscular thight and saw his gigantic owner pointing to her feet. "TOEJAM, FEET" She only said, satisfied as she saw the pet was not only understood her orders but also complied without squeaking. Laura and Bianca had warned her it was rather stupid and had trouble understanding everything. Cassandra never ever tested weither or not it was true, she seemed not to care too much about that. A few times before the pet had let squeals at her but she always dismissively hushed him down with a "shh" and a slight movement of her hand. It seemed to had learned not to annoy her when she was in her relaxation meditation time.

Just as the pet arrived to her feet Cassandra put her earplugs and set relaxing music. "What's the order again?" She wondered thinking of what Laura had told her then clicked her fingers twice. She smiled and readjusted her higher torso to get comfier.
Toejam knew the orders by hearth now, Laura had forced him to remember each whistles clicking or clapping tempo so that they wouldn't have to say a word for him to get to work. As he arrived at the feet, he was marveled by how long, well curved and how wrinkled they were. he was so used to be at his two other owner's feet that he had the feeling of re discovering the beautiful Cassandra's feet. Her feet, just like the rest of her body were drenched in sweat, which allowed some lights reflexion on it. The smell was strong, but not unpleasant, as he had now developped an acute liking in the various strenghness of the smell of the family members, he was in contact almost 24/7 with feet and hadn't any repulsive thought about it, he had seen them all, in either, clean, sweaty or dirty situation. Toejam felt almost as if it was a part of them.

As soon as he heard the two clicking sound of his owner's fingers he knew what he had to do. This order meant, "get to liking.", usually Laura and Bianca added would have added a second command to order an area but either Cassandra forgot about it or didn't care and just wanted to relax, anyways he wouldn't complain to her, he had given up hope in trying to discuss with Cassandra now, if she ever found out who he used to be before, what would she think of it after how he submitted to her, also, he kinda had grew up a liking in being dominated so thoroughly by this beautiful goddess without her even realizing it. He almost enjoyed seeing her, a smart popular attorney, who had one of the most successful attorney office being so superior as she didn't even see him as a human, not on a hating or in a vengeful way, the matter of factly and simplicity of her behavior with him was slowly driving him insane.

Toejam looked at the soles in front of him, its head reached barely higher than Cassandra's heel part, it could see the partly chewed parts of dead skin it had worked on the days before since she was mostly in heels during days her heels seemed to create enough calluses for his daily diet. Toejam lapped once, gathering a significant amount of sweat on his whole face, including his mouth as he moved its face from bottom to top. As he felt his throat in need of some water, he tried to lap at most he could before it evaporated with the heat inside the house. His body felt somehow less reluctant to the vinegary-salty substance than it used to be. Well, after days of sustaining only from that, its tongue seemed to had adapted to aigre / salty taste to the point its pallet seemed to only find taste in that. Maybe it was it's mind playing tricks on him but how could he be sure? Not that it disliked too much the effects since Toejam knew it was it's life now. Toejam suddenly heard another clapping order but couldn't understand it's meaning, he tried to process it's mind and focus on the code but no signification matched the noise, in panick it continued to lick faster but the same series of slaps came again a few seconds after he was in. Toejam began to panick, feeling it wouldn't be able to execute the order and decided to climb the foot on the side to rub her arc but the clapping order came again, making him shiver as he couldn't put a finger on the task.
"TO..TOEJAM" Cassandra slowly said, scaring a bit the pet as she hadn't talked to him in days .
"I..I'm sorry misstress I..I Don't get the order!" The ridicule pet yelled, his tiny squeaks not even reaching the earplugged ears of his goddess. "Once again she spoke up, still her eyes close but with a more hurried voice "TO...TOEJAM".
The pet, timidly stopped moving wondering if he did something bad as Cassandra pointed at her pet still in her lied position. "I..I'm sorry goddess I don't get the orders I'm still learn..;"
"Damn, I said! TOE! TOE! You get it? ....LICK...TOEEES!" she finally added, for the first time seemingly pissed the idiot pet for being cut from her trance and pointing at her toes with each phrases in the most patronizing way Toejam had seen in a while- her tone sounding as if she was trying to teach a trick at the dumbest dog. "LAURA HAS TO TEACH IT BETTER THAN THAT...I'LL HAVE TO TELL HER..." The beautiful woman casually said to herself before getting comfy again and back to her relaxing music.
The pet, on the other side of her long slim and muscular body immediatly climbed again until it reached Cassandra's second favorite's spot and began eating and licking in between the long digits, setting its puny body between her big and second toe to begin. Toejam was hating himself for having forgotten such a simple order and annoyed its master Cassandra.
12111111211112221211111121111212.title: After a good run, a good relaxation

121111112111122212111111211112121.content:
After his little failure, toejam got punished by Laura. He had been placed in ass duty for the whole day and only let out for Bianca and Cassandra to have their feet cleaned up. Laura gave the pet a tuition to make sure he learnt properly the orders once again. If it ever failed to remember a command, which it did a few times, the pet was being flicked, with her long manicured finger, which was just itself longer than the pet's whole body.

Laura told her mother about the ass training their pet was going through and seemed enlightened by the idea. She found a peculiar pleasure having the dumb pet trapped in between her two muscular asscheek while the yoga pant plus the panty forced it flat against her rear while she ran. Whenever she felt it slow down the licking she slapped a side of her butt to remind it to keep up the pace. She was training him the hard way, just like a coach for a sport session.


Today felt like a special day, Toejam mostly stayed at Bainca's and Laura's feet while they slobbered on their phone or computer as usual but when the evening came he realized they all changed their clothes and applied make up. Toejam thought at first they were going out by when Laura asked when the guests arrived the pet understood they were gonna have visit.

He felt rather uneasy being at the contact of other humans. Since his tormented mind had been trapped with for sole interraction his three masters for what felt like ages. Toejam didn't even know how to interract with people anymore. His damaged psyche made him feel he wasn't even able to seek for help, and he wasn't so sure he wanted to risk it....Or was it he wasn't sure he wanted to be saved at all? Realising how silly his thoughts were he shook his head, after all, he was in Laura's gym shoe for a reason and was supposed to clean it for now, so he should only focus on that.


Times passed until a knock was heard. It was....

choices: '...KISS MY BUTT SO I CAN FILM IT FOR MY BLOG'
'...CLEAN MY TOENAILS BEFORE MOM AND AUNT CASSANDRA COME BACK'
1211111121111222121111112111121211.content:
Toejam had once again lost track of time, working with all his might within the muggy darkness of his master's sneaker. Earlier on he had been distracted by a thunderous knocking of the front door, but the family pet had been punished enough times that he wasn't going to let anything slow down his progress cleaning the musty toe prints from Laura's sweat-saturated insole.
He found himself especially eager to please Laura, specifically; the novelty of complete power over her shrunken cousin had worn off for Bianca and she had become accustomed to being Toejam's master, no longer going out of her way to torment her pet, simply using him for what he had been trained to do and replacing him in her boot when she was finished.
Cassandra had never seen him as anything other than the family pet and treated him that way. Since her daughters had taught the family pet to respond to clicks and whistles she had virtually no need to address him directly - unless it was to point out dissatisfaction.
Toejam thought to himself that Laura was the only one left who bothered to torment him - to treat him like anything more than a mindless insect or pair of toenail clippers. The immiserated pet, his face washed with empty tears mixed with grime and sweat from his master's insole, continued licking, harder and faster.

Toejam woke with an electric start. He had passed out from exhaustion - but for how long? It felt as if he had licked non-stop for a day before collapsing, but his tortured mind leaped immediately to anxious conclusions: that he would be found slacking off and punished again. The last order his master had given him was to clean the sneaker insole and that was all he could think to do. He found himself wishing to see his masters again just to feel direction, even if it meant more punishment.

The licking was interrupted by cacophony above as someone opened the shoe closet and soon after Toejam felt the slimy ground beneath him shift and upend, sending him plummeting towards the toe section.
Regaining his senses and gazing up to the sneaker's opening, Toejam had expected to find himself dumped, unceremoniously on the floor, or dropped into the waiting hand of one of his masters, but instead his vision was dominated by an unfamiliar foot in dingy grey socks.
Slightly moist, socked toes quickly surrounded and pinned him. Toejam's brain reeled as he tried to understand what was happening and the smothering toes began to fidget, kneading him into the insole floor. There were rumbling voices in the distance, outside, but the tiny pet couldn't make out what was being said.
Every impulse told him to do as he was trained and start licking and kissing the toes in front of him, but he hadn't been given permission.
After some minutes the pressure lifted, the foot was removed and the rumbling voices became more coherent. '...THERE'S DEFINITELY SOMETHING IN THERE' said a voice that definitely didn't belong to Bianca, Laura or Cassandra. Toejam found himself tumbling, once again down the upturned shoe, this time out of the opening and onto the carpet.
'WOAH,' boomed the giant, 'WHAT IS THAT THING?'
'OH, I WAS WONDERING WHERE I LEFT IT.'
Toejam heard Laura's voice and his heart slowed its pace a little. He tried to crane his neck to see who the stranger was but she was quite a bit taller than Laura, her distant face further obscured by her long hair.
'WHAT IS IT?' asked the girl again. Her voice reminded Toejam of something, but he couldn't quite put his finger on it.
'IT'S OUR FAMILY PET, TOEJAM. IT NORMALLY LIVES IN BIANCA'S BOOTS WHEN WE'RE NOT USING IT, BUT I MUST'VE FORGOTTEN I PUT IT IN MY SNEAKERS A FEW DAYS AGO'
'THAT THING IS ALIVE? IT'S SO PALE AND DIRTY - WAIT,' she said, interrupting her thought with sudden alarm, 'IS IT OK? I MUST'VE STEPPED ON IT A BUNCH OF TIMES'
'IT'S FINE,' replied Laura, 'IT LIVES IN BIANCA'S BOOT BECAUSE MOM KEPT ACCIDENTALLY STEPPING OR SITTING ON IT. TOEJAM CAN TAKE A LOT OF PUNISHMENT.'
'JEEZ, AUNT CASS IS SUCH A CLUMSY PET OWNER'
Toejam was woozy, but still felt like this new girl was a stranger. He knew that he knew her, but his mind rejected the knowledge. Laura briefly explained how they had found, adopted and trained the family pet, as well as his diet and the tricks she had taught him.
'YOU'LL HAVE TO TRY IT WHEN YOU'RE BACK FROM YOUR RUN' suggested Laura
'OH, RIGHT! I HAD FORGOTTEN ABOUT THAT ALREADY - THIS LITTLE THING LOOKS LIKE IT'S STARVING, I BETTER MAKE SURE I GIVE IT ENOUGH TO EAT.'
'TOEJAM WILL BE GREATFUL FOR WHATEVER YOU LET IT EAT. I'LL SEE YOU WHEN YOU GET BACK, SOPH' said Laura
Toejam barely had time to process as Laura immediately turned her attention to the pet at her feet.

Sitting down on the sofa and placing both Toejam and her bare feet up on the coffee table, Laura finally spoke to her pet
'I HAD COMPLETELY FORGOTTEN THAT I LEFT YOU IN MY SNEAKERS. YOU MUST BE PRETTY HUNGRY, HUH?' Laura started to spread open her toes, revealing chunks of dark sock lint and black grime streaking in between the crevices. 'WHAT DO YOU SAY, BOY?'
Toejam dropped straight to his knees and began to yell at the top of his ruined voice
'PLEASE MASTER, LET ME EAT'
Laura heard tiny squeaks from between her toes and smirked. Despite training her pet to beg to eat her toejam and lick underneath her toenails, Laura never could actually hear the words. She just enjoyed that he had to do it.
Laura clapped her hands and Toejam dove straight into the grimy crevices between her toes and started eating mouthfuls of sweaty, oily dirt, while she turned on the tv and began texting.

Toejam ate ravenously for some time until he noticed that he was being watched. Looking up from between his master's slimy toes he saw that the sky had been blotted out by an enormous, black rectangle that he soon realized was a phone. Its blinking red light mesmerised him for a second, but he didn't dare to stop eating - and was too tired and hungry to stop anyway.
'WHAT ARE YOU DOING WITH YOUR PHONE, IZZY? GET AWAY FROM MY FEET, I'M TRYING TO WATCH TV.' said Laura to the new arrival
'IS THAT THE NEW PET BIANCA TOLD ME ABOUT?'
'YEAH, I FINALLY REMEMBERED WHERE I PUT IT - MOVE OUT THE WAY' said Laura, dismissively.
'AWW' cooed Isabel, 'IT REALLY DOES EAT TOEJAM, THAT'S SO AWESOME. WHAT KIND'VE ANIMAL IS IT?'
'WHAT AM I, A ZOO KEEPER? I DON'T KNOW' quipped Laura, trying to concentrate on her show
'IT KINDA LOOKS LIKE A LITTLE MAN, THAT'S HILARIOUS!' said Isabel, giggling and moving her phone closer to her cousin's pet 'KEEP MUNCHING, LITTLE GUY, THIS IS GONNA BE A GREAT VIDEO FOR MY CHANNEL'
Despite all he had been through, Toejam's pallid cheeks flushed a slight red in embarrassment under the camera.
'BIANCA TOLD ME ABOUT THE TRICKS YOU TAUGHT IT - MAKE IT DO A TRICK FOR THE CAMERA!' said Isabel with delight, 'C'MOOOON, PLEEEAAASE?'
Laura grumbled and finally said 'UGH, FINE, BUT ONLY IF YOU LEAVE ME ALONE AFTERWARDS'
Isabel beamed. 'THANKS LAURA! YOURE THE BEST COUSIN'
'OK, WHAT TRICK DO YOU WANT IT TO DO?
Isabel thought for a second and said 'OOOH, MAKE IT...'

1211111121111222121111112112.content:
As Toejam still hesitated on what to do Bianca sat next to her sister, crossing her legs so he could stare up at her sole too. Biance chose to put a Japanese girly song called 'Pon Pon Pon'
" think this cheesy song will fit well our tiny cheesy feet lover" The sisters laughed as the music started.
Realising their pet wasn't dancing Laura spoke up
"Hey Toejam , you should definately start dancing, you're starting to get on my bad sides and I don't think you want to stay on this side..."

Just as the chorus started the tiny creature began wiggling awkwardly trying to follow the rythm. Both the girls began chuckling as he did so, Laura began filming him with her smartphone.
The tiny pet began to feel weird on his legs, as if the jam and fuzz he ate from Bianca's socks was turning his stomach inside out. His head was starting to turn around as he was spending a lot of energy for the first time in a while. He had grown used of being kept in a closed area with no place to move at all. As his dance began to get more and more random Bianca and Laura's face began to lose their smile to let a more quizical face.
"You're losing points Toejaam.." Calmly said Laura still filming.
As the pet tried harder to keep on the rythm the dizzyness took the better part of him. He tried to ignore it to the point he actually felt he couldn't contain the nausea anymore and puked. His eyes almost popped out as he saw the black coloured vomit and half digested black fuzz coming from his mouth.

"Eeeeeewww the little bastard threw up" Bianca said , pointing the obvious.

"Such a disappointment ..." Laura added as she stopped filming.

Toejam couldn't hold on anymore, as he felt utter despair and a overwhelming pain in his hearth he began sobbing lying on the ground next to his vomit.

"Hey what's that ?! It's making a whole scene now " Bianca was surprised to see Toejam having such a sudden behaviour.

Laura remained silence as she watched the little insect cry on the floor.

"Hey ! We didn't ask you to be a crybaby Toejam ! Stand up !" Bianca yield suddenly stomping her foot on the ground sending a powerfull wave through his body.

"Jeez, so pathetic..." Laura said slowly standing up "Let's just end this." She put her sneaker back on before raising her foot in the air.

"What ? You're gonna crush him ? But mom and I like him doing our feet ! " Bianca pouted realising she'll lose another pet.

"Yeah... I think it just proved how useless and how disgusting it is. I don't want this puker to go anywhere near my feet, I'll get diseases for sure."

Toejam looked up as he felt a huge shadow covering his whole body. Laura's sneaker was a few inches away from him ready to turn him into the pavement.

Still crying he let out a screaming squeal of fear and yield begs not to be crushed.

"There it goes squeaking again " Laura said rolling her eyes. "I'll let you 10 seconds to do whatever your goodbye to this world then bye bye"

"Come on Laura don't crush it ! Please !" Bianca pouted again, not really moving from her spot.

"10...9.." The tall goddess-like Laura began counting down.
1211111121111222121111112112.title: Pon pon pon

12111111211112221211111121121.content:
"PLEASE GODDESS LAURA PLEAAAASE !" Begged the poor shrunken pet.
"7..6"

"I'I I'M SO SORRY GODDEEEESS" It cried out tears pouring from it's tiny eyes.

"5...4..."

The tiny creature galanced high up to the looming sole of the sneaker raising high above it. It couldn't controls the tears flowing from his eyes as despair took upon it.

"3...2"

The small thing tried standing up but his trembling legs betrayed it , letting fall back on his ass before lying and crying in its usual fetal position.

"...1..." The foot raised even higher.

ToeJam yield all his lungs out as he jnew what was coming. In a sudden gesture the foot came crushing in a loud thud just inches beside it. Making the bug sized pet fly around.

its sences totally stopped by the strong impact, it finally came back as Laura raised her pet up to her eye level.

"You don't wanna be squished bug ?" Asked calmy in a goddess like posture Laura

The bug boy was so overwhelmed by fear not a single word came from its mouth, it shooked it's head almost in a spasm manner/

Laura chuckled a little before letting the bug fall to her palm.

"I won't crush you then bug. I don't want my sneaker to be dirty anyways."

The bug boy felt relieved, almost like it was the first good thing that happened to it in it's long and never ending nightmare/

"T.T...Th...Thank you...G...Go...Goddess Laura "

Laura calmly let a soft contained laugh "I am indeed a goddess to you, and you shall worship me as such from now on..."

"Y...Y...Ye..Yes M...My ...G..Godd...Goddess " The foot pet finally let tears of joy pouring. He was so relieved to be alive. Laura's role had definately switched now. he had a hard time admitting she was its mistress but now it felt cristal clear she was a goddess.

Her fixing calm stare let a little smirk on her beautifull lips. Toejam suddenly felt it though, a sudden tickling coming from inside of it ...As he looked around Goddess Laura's palm it saw it was slowly expending , again and again.

"G...G...GoDeSS ..W..What ?" His squeals were getting wimpier and wimpier as he slowly shrunk down again and again.

"As your Goddess I've decided to banish you from our world. You're such an insignificant piece of dirt I've decided you'll be getting a size that suits you the best. In fact you'll now be living amongst the bugs, just were you belong. " Laura was saying that in her usual calm and matter-of-a-factly way as the poor bug man squeled even so acutely as it shrunk down to nothingness.

Laura shrank the poor creature until it was barely visible . "Bye Bye little bug." She gave a wide smile before letting a sudden blow that sent it flying away into oblivion.


Bianca was kind of pissed at first but after a week she reconciliated with her sister, they sometimes spoke about Toejam, mainly sharing a good laughter as they did so. The poor bug was never seen again.

12111111211112221212.content:
ear the shed being unlocked as you stand there 2' tall so you hide behind the book case expecting that if it's Bianca entering she will probably kick your ass for being this big. The door opens and you find it is Bianca alone. "Hey twerp I brought you some food." she yells.

She scans the room and sees that you didn't come out. She steps forward slamming her foot down. "That means come out." You shout back "Sorry goddess," and run out and go straight to kissing her feet which currently in a cute pair of converse.

"...Gosh , That's so weiiird! " Exlaimed Ava while focusing on you.

She then set her dirty sock in the cage. "There , so you can still have a little part of me with you lil boy " She winked at you.

"Th...Thank you Bianca" You said as genuinly as you could.

And so you were. relaxing on Bianca's sock in a hamster cage. She had set it under her desk so Cassandra ,her mom wouldn't check on it if she came by.



About an hour later , you saw for the first time Cassandra. If Bianca , Ava and Laura were giants to you, Cassandra , the 5'7" tall well curved woman was even bigger.

At you size, you felt rather like a bug than a pet .

1311.content:
You were getting sick of this. Isabel was quickly starting to become a major nuisance, and she clearly had no intention of leaving you alone any time soon. Not willing to put up with her any more, you stood up and walked over to kick your sister out of your room. However, as soon as you stood up, your angry little sister jumped on you and tackled you to the ground.

This was hardly the first time that you had gotten into a fight like this. On the contrary, this was actually a fairly common occurrence. Isabel would catch you off guard and knock you to the ground, you would roll around wrestling with her for a bit, and then after a few minutes you would come out on top and she'd have no choice but to leave you alone.

However, this time something was wrong. Usually you could shove your little sister off of you with only a small amount of effort, but this time... This time she was somehow able to hold you down. You struggled with all your strength, but no matter how hard you tried, you were unable to make Isabel's body move. This was bad. Very bad.

Isabel simply stared at you, a look of confusion on her face. At first she thought you were just messing around, going easy on her or something. But as she watched the strained expressions form on your face, she quickly began to realize that you weren't messing around. You were seriously trying to shove her off, but you couldn't. Then it dawned on her: she was stronger than you now. She didn't know what had happened to make you so weak, but she didn't care one bit.

This was amazing. She wasn't even putting any effort into keeping you pinned down, she was just sitting there and watching you struggle. She wasn't even very heavy, and yet her body weight alone was keeping you pinned down beneath her. As she thought about this for a bit, she realized something else: If you were so weak now that you couldn't move her when she wasn't even trying to keep you pinned down, then she could do anything that she wanted to you and you wouldn't be able to do anything to stop her.

After years of being the weaker sibling, she was finally the one in charge for once. Right now you were just a powerless little plaything for her to do with as she pleased. As these thoughts swirled through her head, a devilish smile spread across her face. As soon as you saw the way she was looking at you, your face paled. That wasn't the way a younger sister would look at their older brother, that was the way that a cat would look down at a mouse that it had caught by the tail.

"U-ummm... Isabel? Could you please get off of me?" You asked, trying to hide your fear, but not doing a very good job of it.

"Hmmm? What's that big brother? Are you asking me, your little sister, to get off of you? What's wrong, why don't you just push me off like you always do?" Isabel asked, trying to act surprised even though she had already figured it out.

"Well, I... Ummm..." You mumbled to yourself nervously.

"Oh no, don't tell me that you can't do it! I'm not even trying right now. You always manage to overpower me even when I'm giving it my all, so don't even try to tell me that you can't get me off of you now!"

"I... I'm trying! You must have put on some weight or something! I can't-" You instantly shut up when you saw Isabel's playful smirk turn into a furious glare, and you realized just how stupid what you said was.

Isabel, now very pissed off at you, raised her hand up before bringing it back down and slapping you across the face. In truth she hadn't put much of her strength into that slap, but to you it hurt more than anything that you had ever felt in your entire life. Your cheek burned with pain as you looked up at your little sister, the fear of her now very clearly written on your face. You thought for a moment that Isabel was going to beat you up right here and now, but much to your surprise the rage quickly faded off of her face, being replaced by a calm smile that somehow managed to scare you even more.

"I'm sorry, brother, I think I might have misheard you. Did you just say that I gained weight? Because I can certainly assure you that I haven't put on a single pound. I'm still just as cute and skinny as I've always been. Hey... Did you ever stop to think that maybe, just maybe, It's not me who's heavier, but you who's just really weak now? Because that's what it feels like to me." Isabel said, trying to put on her best polite act.

"Uhhhh..." You couldn't even think of anything to say in response.

Isabel once again slapped you across the face, this time on the opposite cheek.

"That's it, isn't it. You're really weak now, big brother. You're so weak that you can't even resist little ol' me. I'm your little sister, and I'm stronger than you now. I hope you know what that means, big brother" Isabel said in a teasing tone.

You gulped nervously, not saying a word.

"Awww, you can't even figure that one out? Fine then, I'll tell you. It means that all those years you've spent pushing me around have finally come back to bite you. Now you, my stupid and weak big brother, are going to be taking orders from me for a change." Isabel said, the devilish smile never leaving your face.

You began to open your mouth in protest, but Isabel raising her hand and threatening to slap you again quickly silenced you.

"Now, what to do with my new wimpy toy..." Isabel thought out loud.


What happens next?
